column4: Songbird is nice but a little buggy and resource hungry, got some cool unique features though
I've never used it myself.  I always get disillusioned when I use anything other than Amarok.
Even with all Amarok's shortcomings, it's still lightyears ahead of all the others.
Amarok is nice, but I prefer GTK apps. I do get jeleous of Amarok's monkeybraiz support though
